divs: Sighting Detailsi just pulled into the drive way of my house, i got out of the car and looked up at one of the brightest stars in the night sky in the west, i glanced over and there it was, moving really slow, i saw a glare of light bounce off of it. seems to be in a V shape, moving in one direction, i walked closer to get a better look and within 20 seconds it seemed to disappear and i did not see anything else except a few flickering lights from the airplanes in all different directions. I thought to myself that i did not look like a bird, it just grabbed my attention so fast. there was no noise it was a quiet night in the neighborhood. i still do not know what it is.
Summary: dark sky, did not look like flock of geese. moved slow. disappeared.
